title: All the Backlist! November 20, 2020
description:
This week, Tirzah talks about two great backlist memoirs that have connections to Thanksgiving!
This episode is sponsored by  KidsBuzz .

Books Discussed:
In the Dream House by Carmen Maria Macahdo
The Rules Do Not Apply by Ariel Levy
